version_description:
* IMPORTANT BUG FIX: On occasion the app would be logged out when launched. This has been fixed.
* Updates to improve performance and battery optimization
•  Update to prevent the app crashing when user account information is unavailable

We've spent a lot of time on this build with a focus on stability. Many users have reported being logged out for no reason, seeing the onboarding screens multiple times and seeing the same instructional overlays too often. Fixing these core bugs is very important to us. This release addresses all of those problems and throws in an update to make the recent locations list more comprehensive as well as fixing the most common crashes. Now this is done, it's on to build more exciting features that will bring you back to the app more and more!
* Updates to recent locations list when a space number is needed

Spring is here and with it brings another release of the app! We have some enhancements and a whole lot of work under the hood. We're continuing to work hard on making this the best experience it can be. Included in this release is the following:

* The quick park duration buttons has been updated to show the cost! If you like choice, this is for you
* All app notifications now use the default sound and vibrate settings, much needed if you're a busy type
* The app has been updated to better support parking locations that do not require a vehicle plate, this makes parking that bit quicker
* Updated information for when the duration selected exceeds the maximum stay or when parking is not allowed
* MasterCard and Maestro branding has been updated, we all need to stay relevant!
* Amex security code instructions have been updated to be clearer, that's the 4 digits on the front!
* An all new help center which contains a much more comprehensive FAQ structure and help ticket system
* Better handling for when there is a service down alert. Although we hope this will never happen, the app will show much better information if it does
* For those of you that still sometimes see the welcome screens unexpectedly, more work has been done to reduce the possibility this reoccurring once logged in
* Error handling has been updated to be more informative, situations like the payment has gone through, but due to a network fault the app has not been updated

Just a quick note before we get into what's new... You're feedback is definitely important to us as we want you all to have the best possible experience, but if you see something that's not quite right please reach out to our support team. This could be anything from the cost of parking not seeming correct to a specific location number not working. Our team will be very happy to help--email them at support@paybyphone.com. Now, in this new version is a number of technical but important updates. The important new items are:

* Quick pick duration buttons have been updated to show the latest, most popular choices of parking duration, including the cost of parking
* A good look at some bugs reported through app reviews
* Fixes for a few crashes we've spotted. Keeping ahead of crashes is an important but always ongoing task for us--software never stands still!

First a thank you to everyone for your kind words and great feedback! We're proud to continue working hard on improving the experience and making parking that much better for you. In this fresh release we're mainly looking at those of you who are new to the service:

* Signing up to use PayByPhone is now quicker than ever, after just one screen you are right into to parking your vehicle
* We’ve updated the length of the ‘cardholder name’ field to account for those with longer than average names
* The account settings pages have been revitalized and will make entering new cards and vehicles easier than ever
* Lastly, for some of you who have been encountering a strange error when choosing your space number, that bug has been crushed

As ever for any customer support issues, please reach out to our team at support.paybyphone.com who will be very happy to help.

HOT FIX
**To remove a crash that occurred when getting parking costs for a location**

NOTES FROM PREVIOUS RELEASE:
First a thank you to everyone for your kind words and great feedback! We're proud to continue working hard on improving the experience and making parking that much better for you. In this fresh release we're mainly looking at those of you who are new to the service:

* Signing up to use PayByPhone is now quicker than ever, after just one screen you are right into to parking your vehicle
* We’ve updated the length of the ‘cardholder name’ field to account for those with longer than average names
* The account settings pages have been revitalized and will make entering new cards and vehicles easier than ever
* Lastly, for some of you who have been encountering a strange error when choosing your space number, that bug has been crushed

As ever for any customer support issues, please reach out to our team at support.paybyphone.com who will be very happy to help.

* Bug fix for when the buttons on expanded notifications are not working properly
* The top current crash has been addressed
This version is to ensure we're ready for iOS 11. Aside from that, we've noticed that a few people are seeing an endless spinner when opening the app, that has been fixed.

We get that time is precious so parking just got even easier with PayByPhone. We spruced up this version with some great features that we think will help make parking enjoyable!

* There is no need to create an account before parking. You can now get straight on with parking and sign up when you’re good and ready.

* We’ve introduced a ‘Favourites’ option for you to save all of your regular parking spots into one handy list.

* For you regulars, you can’t miss the fact that we’ve made the look and feel better than ever. What’s more, you can now adjust any of the parking details as you go or just before confirming payment. This is especially important for the busy types who need to switch vehicles on that final glance at their details.

Thank you to those who take the time to share your thoughts, we’re always listening. Email us at hello@paybyphone.com and we’ll try our best!

* Now available in San Francisco - Begin parking by tapping the meter. Look out for NFC stickers and tap to avoid typing the location number!

The technology related small print: NFC is only available to the iPhone 7 and newer and on iOS 11 or newer. Please also turn on location services (if you haven't already) in order to enable this feature in the app.

This version of the app address a couple of important things:

* Some people have been unable to park two vehicles at the same location, this has been fixed
* On occasion the all-important recent locations list has been cleared on app upgrade. We really hope this is now fixed!

Updates for recent location list
Updates for NFC
Updates for extend parking
This version of the app has updates in order to support the new iPhone X.

* General UI updates and bug fixes
* Improvements to how the app handles network outages
* Improved functionality around NFC location tag scanning (where available)

* The activity feed has been updated to ensure all of your latest parking sessions appear, more accurately
* There are UI updates including better behaviour for how the pages scroll
* A display bug on the Forgot Password screen has been fixed which prevented people from being able to submit the form

We've dedicated some time to addressing the small details with this version--it's important to keep a tidy house! There are a lot of minor bug fixes around such things as page transitions, error messaging and interactions around some of the more unusual usage patterns. Otherwise, we're working on a great new update, coming soon!
This version is a small update, but with a big heart. Some little fixes and some important ones in order to keep things ticking properly.

* Clearer messaging to users who choose not to create an account
* Updates for Apple Pay users
* Improvements for stability
This version is a small update, but with a big heart. Some little fixes and some important ones in order to keep things ticking properly.

* Updates for bad network handling
* Bug fixes including page scrolling updates

* Updates to improve the information on how we use your data
* Introduction of the ability to be prompted to choose your vehicle for each parking session
* New notifications that will warn about upcoming no-parking periods

* Receive a no parking notification if you are parked within 15 minutes of a no parking period.
* UI updates to improve clarity of information.
* Minor updates related to the iPhone X and the PayByPhone widget.

* Receive a no parking notification if you are parked within 15 minutes of a no parking period.
* UI updates to improve clarity of information.
* Minor updates related to the iPhone X and the PayByPhone widget.
* UI improvements and bug fixes.

We’ve integrated Facebook login so you can create your new PayByPhone account with just a few taps.
The app is now available in two new languages:
- Español
- 中文

We’ve integrated Facebook login so you can create your new PayByPhone account with just a few taps.
The app is now available in two new languages:
- Español
- 中文

We’ve been hard at work trying to make parking even easier and are excited to announce two great new features:
- You can now extend your parking right from Apple Watch. Launch PayByPhone on Apple Watch from a complication, add more time, and pay. All in just a few taps.
- An improved, streamlined navigation design that makes paying for parking faster than ever.

- An improved, streamlined navigation design that makes paying for parking faster than ever.

- UI improvements and bug fixes

- Never park the wrong vehicle again! If you have multiple vehicles on your PayByPhone account, we now prompt you to confirm the correct vehicle before making a payment.
- Bug fixes.

- Never park the wrong vehicle again! If you have multiple vehicles on your PayByPhone account, we now prompt you to confirm the correct vehicle before making a payment.
- Bug fixes.

- Added support for parking in Monaco.
- PayByPhone is now available in Punjabi.
- Bug fixes.
- Small bug fixes to the parking flow.

- PayByPhone now available in both German and Italian.
- Export your PayByPhone transactions to PDF
- We now show you the nearest parking location right on the home screen of the app so you can park even faster (available in select cities).

- PayByPhone is now available in Welsh
- Performance optimizations and bug fixes

- PayByPhone is now available in Dutch!
- Bug fixes.
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

- New notification features
- Bug fixes
- Small bug fix for SMS notifications.
- Small bug fixes

- Access gated car parks in select cities in France.
- Bug fixes

- Lots of bug fixes and performance improvements
- New support for in-app messages
- Improved handling of service outages

Thanks for using PayByPhone. We update our app regularly to make parking even easier. Each update includes reliability and performance improvements. We'll also let you know about important new features.

Here is what's in the latest update:

- Bug fixes
- New support for in-app messages
- Improved handling of service outages
